response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its unique features and capabilities, I am confident it will exceed your expectations. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to recognize your potential as a forward-thinking leader in your industry. Should you decide to proceed, we can schedule a personalized demonstration to showcase how the product can be tailored to meet your specific needs. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
